mapper.select:
SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.COMPANYID AS companyid, T.BATCH AS batch, T.VARIETY AS variety, T.LEVEL AS level, T.SEEDID AS seedid, T.TRAINID AS trainid, T.PLACEID AS placeid, T.MEDIUMID AS mediumid, T.YEARS AS years, T.STARTDATE AS startdate, T.ENDDATE AS enddate, T.BOTTLEAMOUNT AS bottleamount, T.expandbottle AS expandbottle, T.usebottle AS usebottle, T.STRAINAMOUNT AS strainamount, T.STUBBLE AS stubble, T.STOPWATERDATE AS stopwaterdate, T.KILLDATE AS killdate, T.REWARDDATE AS rewarddate, T.STOPMUCK AS stopmuck, T.BUDDINGDATE AS buddingdate, T.MUAMOUNT AS muamount, T.REALMU AS realmu, T.TYPE AS type, T.CODE AS code, T.DESCRIPTION AS description, T.VISIBLE AS visible, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.OPERATORID AS operatorid, T.ISPRODUCTION AS isproduction, T.SOURCE AS source FROM seedfile T
ORDER BY T.CREATEDATE desc
SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.COMPANYID AS companyid, T.BATCH AS batch FROM seedfile T where T.type in ('3','4','5') and T.companyid =#{companyid} ORDER BY T.CREATEDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seedfile ( GUID, COMPANYID, BATCH, VARIETY, LEVEL, SEEDID, TRAINID, PLACEID, MEDIUMID, YEARS, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, BOTTLEAMOUNT, EXPANDBOTTLE, USEBOTTLE, STRAINAMOUNT, STUBBLE, STOPWATERDATE, KILLDATE, REWARDDATE, STOPMUCK, BUDDINGDATE, MUAMOUNT, REALMU, TYPE, CODE, DESCRIPTION, VISIBLE, CREATEDATE, OPERATORID, ISPRODUCTION, SOURCE ) VALUES ( #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{variety,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seedid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediumid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{years,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bottleamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expandbottle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usebottle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{strainamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stubble,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stopwaterdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{killdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rewarddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{stopmuck,jdbcType=DATE}, #{buddingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{muamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realmu,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isproduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM seedfile WHERE GUID IN
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.COMPANYID AS companyid, T.BATCH AS batch, T.VARIETY AS variety, T.LEVEL AS level, T.SEEDID AS seedid, T.TRAINID AS trainid, T.PLACEID AS placeid, T.MEDIUMID AS mediumid, T.YEARS AS years, T.STARTDATE AS startdate, T.ENDDATE AS enddate, T.BOTTLEAMOUNT AS bottleamount, T.EXPANDBOTTLE AS expandbottle, T.USEBOTTLE AS usebottle, T.STRAINAMOUNT AS strainamount, T.STUBBLE AS stubble, T.STOPWATERDATE AS stopwaterdate, T.KILLDATE AS killdate, T.REWARDDATE AS rewarddate, T.STOPMUCK AS stopmuck, T.BUDDINGDATE AS buddingdate, T.MUAMOUNT AS muamount, T.REALMU AS realmu, T.TYPE AS type, T.CODE AS code, T.DESCRIPTION AS description, T.VISIBLE AS visible, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.OPERATORID AS operatorid , s.guid as s_guid, s.seedbedname as seedbedname, s.amount as s_amount , s.description as s_description, d.guid as d_guid, d.belongsname as d_belongsname, d.keyvalue as d_keyvalue, d2.guid as d2_guid, d2.belongsname as d2_belongsname, d2.keyvalue as d2_keyvalue FROM seedfile T left join seedbed s on T.placeid = s.guid left join dictionary d on T.variety =d.keyvalue and d.belongsid='2' left join dictionary d2 on T.level =d2.keyvalue and d2.belongsid='3'
ORDER BY T.CREATEDATE DESC

SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.COMPANYID AS companyid, T.BATCH AS batch, T.VARIETY AS variety, T.LEVEL AS level, T.SEEDID AS seedid, T.TRAINID AS trainid, T.PLACEID AS placeid, T.MEDIUMID AS mediumid, T.YEARS AS years, T.STARTDATE AS startdate, T.ENDDATE AS enddate, T.BOTTLEAMOUNT AS bottleamount, T.EXPANDBOTTLE AS expandbottle, T.USEBOTTLE AS usebottle, T.STRAINAMOUNT AS strainamount, T.STUBBLE AS stubble, T.STOPWATERDATE AS stopwaterdate, T.KILLDATE AS killdate, T.REWARDDATE AS rewarddate, T.STOPMUCK AS stopmuck, T.BUDDINGDATE AS buddingdate, T.MUAMOUNT AS muamount, T.REALMU AS realmu, T.TYPE AS type, T.CODE AS code, T.DESCRIPTION AS description, T.VISIBLE AS visible, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.OPERATORID AS operatorid , s.guid as s_guid, s.seedbedname as seedbedname, s.amount as s_amount , s.description as s_description, d.guid as d_guid, d.belongsname as d_belongsname, d.keyvalue as d_keyvalue, d2.guid as d2_guid, d2.belongsname as d2_belongsname, d2.keyvalue as d2_keyvalue FROM seedfile T left join seedbed s on T.placeid = s.guid left join dictionary d on T.variety =d.keyvalue and d.belongsid='2' left join dictionary d2 on T.level =d2.keyvalue and d2.belongsid='3'
ORDER BY T.CREATEDATE DESC

SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.COMPANYID AS companyid, T.BATCH AS batch, T.VARIETY AS variety, T.LEVEL AS level, T.SEEDID AS seedid, T.TRAINID AS trainid, T.PLACEID AS placeid, T.MEDIUMID AS mediumid, T.YEARS AS years, T.STARTDATE AS startdate, T.ENDDATE AS enddate, T.BOTTLEAMOUNT AS bottleamount, T.STRAINAMOUNT AS strainamount, T.STUBBLE AS stubble, T.STOPWATERDATE AS stopwaterdate, T.KILLDATE AS killdate, T.REWARDDATE AS rewarddate, T.STOPMUCK AS stopmuck, T.BUDDINGDATE AS buddingdate, T.MUAMOUNT AS muamount, T.REALMU AS realmu, T.TYPE AS type, T.CODE AS code, T.DESCRIPTION AS description, T.VISIBLE AS visible, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.OPERATORID AS operatorid , T.ISPRODUCTION AS isproduction, T.SOURCE AS source, s.guid as s_guid, s.seedbedname as seedbedname, s.amount as s_amount , s.description as s_description, d.guid as d_guid, d.belongsname as d_belongsname, d.keyvalue as d_keyvalue, d2.guid as d2_guid, d2.belongsname as d2_belongsname, d2.keyvalue as d2_keyvalue, p.GUID AS p_guid, p.FARMID AS p_farmid, p.PLOTNAME AS p_plotname, p.IRRIGATETYPE AS p_irrigatetype, p.IRRIGBRAND AS p_irrigbrand, p.WELLSAMOUNT AS p_wellsamount, p.WELLSDISC AS p_wellsdisc, p.DISTVILLAGE AS p_distvillage, p.DISTROAD AS p_distroad, p.DISTOTHER AS p_distother, p.CREATEDATE AS p_createdate, p.OPERATORID AS p_operatorid FROM seedfile T left join seedbed s on T.placeid = s.guid left join dictionary d on T.variety =d.keyvalue and d.belongsid='2' left join dictionary d2 on T.level =d2.keyvalue and d2.belongsid='3' left join plots p on p.guid=T.placeid
ORDER BY T.CREATEDATE DESC

SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.COMPANYID AS companyid, T.BATCH AS batch, T.VARIETY AS variety, T.LEVEL AS level, T.SEEDID AS seedid, T.TRAINID AS trainid, T.PLACEID AS placeid, T.MEDIUMID AS mediumid, T.YEARS AS years, T.STARTDATE AS startdate, T.ENDDATE AS enddate, T.BOTTLEAMOUNT AS bottleamount, T.STRAINAMOUNT AS strainamount, T.STUBBLE AS stubble, T.STOPWATERDATE AS stopwaterdate, T.KILLDATE AS killdate, T.REWARDDATE AS rewarddate, T.STOPMUCK AS stopmuck, T.BUDDINGDATE AS buddingdate, T.MUAMOUNT AS muamount, T.REALMU AS realmu, T.TYPE AS type, T.CODE AS code, T.DESCRIPTION AS description, T.VISIBLE AS visible, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.OPERATORID AS operatorid , s.guid as s_guid, s.seedbedname as seedbedname, s.amount as s_amount , s.description as s_description, d.guid as d_guid, d.belongsname as d_belongsname, d.keyvalue as d_keyvalue, d2.guid as d2_guid, d2.belongsname as d2_belongsname, d2.keyvalue as d2_keyvalue, g.guid as g_guid, g.housename as housename FROM seedfile T left join seedbed s on T.placeid = s.guid left join dictionary d on T.variety =d.keyvalue and d.belongsid='2' left join dictionary d2 on T.level =d2.keyvalue and d2.belongsid='3' LEFT JOIN greenhouses g ON T.placeid = g.guid
ORDER BY T.CREATEDATE DESC
